mission.title: Continuum Mission
mission.description: Use Immortalized Crew to ensure the Continuum stays on the correct path. (Placeholder)

potential_rewards.name: Merits
potential_rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

potential_rewards.name: Quantum Energy
potential_rewards.flavor: Quantum--a mortal term for Q energy--is needed in order to retrieve crew. Quantum will regenerate over time, but the Q can only hold so much at a time. Plan your crew retrieval operations in order to make efficient use of this resource. Quantum can be regenerated instantly in exchange for Dilithium.

potential_rewards.name: Dilithium
potential_rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

quests.name: An Infinite Welcome
quests.description: Q has invited you to enter the Continuum, represented by a door that presumably leads to a house. Enter and explore!

reward.name: Medicine Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

reward.name: Science Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: The Vedek's Trail
quests.description: Teero Anaydis is the prime suspect behind an otherwise inexplicable Bajoran mutiny, but the trail has gone cold. Pick it up and find him!

reward.name: Medicine Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

reward.name: Medicine Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Stolen Honor
quests.description: Augment agents have robbed the Klingon Empire of valuable cultural artifacts. Gowron has requested your assistance in their return.

quests.name: The Wrong Crowd
quests.description: An adult version of Worf's son Alexander has joined the Augments! Repel them from the House of Martok on Worf's behalf.

reward.name: Science Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

reward.name: Science Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Manna from Heaven
quests.description: Major Kira's first relief effort is helping a Cardassian colony on the brink of starvation. Beam down to provide food and medical aid.

reward.name: Command Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

reward.name: Engineering Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

reward.name: Science Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: The Prodigal Son
quests.description: Worf must meet face to face with Alexander in order to learn the truth of his son's new alliance. Enter an Augment colony and find him!

reward.name: Science Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Assault and Battery
quests.description: Augment forces have kidnapped a version of Data. Board their ship and rescue the famed android Starfleet officer!

quests.name: Mudd's Enterprise
quests.description: The criminal Harry Mudd has been caught trying to steal a Galaxy-class starship. Can your away team apprehend him before he escapes the disabled ship?

reward.name: Science Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Temporary Hold
quests.description: Michael Eddington is being held by the Cardassians, who claim to be curing his mental instability. Infiltrate their facility to learn the truth.

quests.name: Behind Closed Doors
quests.description: The Vulcan T'Pol has accused Gowron of being in league with the Augments and plotting to usurp Emperor Kahless. Find proof of this, if you can.

reward.name: Engineering Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

reward.name: Engineering Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Picking the Bones
quests.description: Doctor McCoy is onboard a Maquis transport fleeing its Bajoran pursuers. Can you help them escape?

stages.text: Put Space Between Maquis and Bajorans

reward.name: Engineering Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

reward.name: Science Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: A Father Figure
quests.description: The Augments plan to capture Doctor Noonian Soong, Data's creator, for reasons unknown. Reach him before the Augments do!

reward.name: Diplomacy Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Self Control
quests.description: Quark's future and past selves seem unwilling of resolving their differences without outside assistance. Act as arbitrator in their dispute.

reward.name: Engineering Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

reward.name: Science Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Of Two Evils
quests.description: Admiral Riker has suggested you use Borg to take control of Lore's androids, and then help arrest Lore himself. Will you take his advice?

quests.name: Rescue the Val Jean
quests.description: The Val JeanChakotay's Maquis raideris caught in a plasma storm. Help them escape!

stages.text: Convince or Force Maquis to Accept Help
Move Val Jean to Safe Position

reward.name: Diplomacy Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Thy Enemy's Secrets
quests.description: Raid a Federation starbase which is temporarily hosting a secret Section 31 data archive.

reward.name: Command Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: One Future Ends
quests.description: As Telek R'Mor arrives at the rendezvous point, a temporal rift has suddenly appeared. Scan this newly-formed temporal anomaly for signs of trouble.

reward.name: Security Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Surveying the Sphere
quests.description: Investigate the sphere as thoroughly as possible while attempting to locate the Female Changeling and any other Founders hiding here.

reward.name: Command Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

reward.name: Command Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Maquis Incitement
quests.description: The crew of the Val Jean plans to fire a Bajoran weapon at a Bajoran target to incite war! Can you stop them?

stages.text: Locate Weapon Maquis Intend to Fire
Get the Maquis to Abandon Plan

reward.name: Medicine Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Back to School
quests.description: Zefram Cochrane University has been indoctrinating Terran Empire subjects and creating extremists. Help Mirror Sisko sabotage the education program.

reward.name: Security Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.
